name: se_project_spots
description: This is a continued version of project 3 & 5 spots. Here I have added Form Validation to show errors when form fields are entered incorrectly. As well as adding some eventListeners to be able to "click" off of the form and press "Escape" to both exit the form and go back to the page. While also refactoring some of the previous hardcoded code.
author: Sam Waxman
